actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Navigation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Navigation

official_title: A bill to require construction contractors for the Coast Guard to employ local residents in areas of high unemployment.

summary.text: Requires Coast Guard construction contracts for facilities located in a State with higher than the national average unemployment to require the employment of local residents unless they do not possess the requisite skills.

titles.title: A bill to require construction contractors for the Coast Guard to employ local residents in areas of high unemployment.
